title: BMW Group - shipments 2006 to 2018
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Automobile sales in units, containing a total of 13 data points.
In general Automobile sales in units has rose over the Year.
Automobile sales in units is roughly constant from 2006 to 2008, roughly decreasing from 2008 to 2009, gradually increasing from 2009 to 2015, and lastly roughly constant from 2015 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2011.
The highest Automobile sales in units, of value 2490664.0 was reached at Year 2018
Minimum Automobile sales in units about 1286310.0 was reached at Year 2009
